description: '''Jinusean''' (stylized in [[all caps]]; {{Korean|hangul=지누션}}) is a South Korean [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] duo signed to [[YG Entertainment]]. The duo, which is made up of Kim Jin-woo (also known as Jinu) and Noh Seung-hwan (also known as Sean), debuted in 1997 and rose to fame with the single, "Tell Me." They are considered pioneers of [[Korean hip hop]].
